name: vha.waterinfo.be/arcgis/rest/services
description: ArcGIS REST services endpoint for water information data, presumably for Flanders (Belgium). This endpoint provides access to geospatial datasets and services related to water-related variables such as air pressure, water level, discharge, etc. The specific owner and publisher details are not fully disclosed in the raw text, but the domain (waterinfo.be) is typically associated with Flemish (Belgium) regional water authorities.
